resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157804</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157804</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2810</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Friendship Club -student Activity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Freundschaft-Verein - Kursteilnehmer 
Aktivität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le club d'amitié - activité d'étudiant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O clube do friendship - atividade do estudante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il randello di amicizia - attività dell'allievo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η λέσχη φιλίας - δραστηριότητα σπουδαστών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El club de la amistad - actividad del estudiante</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A student assignment for assessment of a reading and writing activity where students read about aspects of friendship and are asked to write a short story of a personal act of friendship.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">social interaction.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Kursteilnehmeranweisung für Einschätzung 
einer Lese- und Schreibenaktivität in der die Kursteilnehmer, die 
über Aspekte der Freundschaft gelesen werden und gebeten werden, eine
kurze Geschichte einer persönlichen Tat der Freundschaft zu 
schreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une affectation d'étudiant pour l'évaluation 
d'une activité de lecture et d'écriture où des étudiants eus 
connaissance des aspects de l'amitié et sont invitées à écrire une
histoire courte d'un acte personnel de l'amitié.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atribuição do estudante para a avaliação 
de uma atividade da leitura e da escrita onde os estudantes lidos 
sobre aspectos do friendship e é pedida para escrever uma história 
curta de um ato pessoal do friendship.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'assegnazione dell'allievo per la valutazione di
un'attività di scrittura e della lettura dove allievi letti sulle 
funzioni di amicizia ed è chiesta di scrivere una storia corta di un 
atto personale di amicizia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ανάθεση σπουδαστών για την αξιολόγηση μιας 
δραστηριότητας ανάγνωσης και γραψίματος όπου οι σπουδαστές 
διαβάζουν για τις πτυχές της φιλίας και καλούνται να γράψουν μια 
σύντομη ιστορία μιας προσωπικής πράξης της φιλίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una asignación del estudiante para el gravamen de
una actividad de la lectura y de la escritura donde los estudiantes 
leídos sobre aspectos de la amistad y se pide escribir una historia 
corta de un acto personal de la amistad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialinteraktion.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">interaction sociale.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interação social.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linguaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interazione sociale.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κοινωνική αλληλεπίδραση.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">lenguaje</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">interacción social.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
